about_the_game:
Cedric & Odious is a pixel art action RPG set in a dark and treacherous fantasy world.

A Bond Torn by Death

Take the role of Cedric, a warrior king resurrected by his once-loyal friend, Odious, a brilliant but morally corrupt sorcerer. In life, their camaraderie was legendary. In death, Cedric finds himself bound to Odious's will, forced to carry out the sorcerer’s plans. Haunted by vague memories of their shared past and uneasy about Odious’s intentions, Cedric must decide: obey the man who saved him or face death again and again.

Dynamic Combat and Tactical Mastery

  • Challenging Enemies: Confront the harsh realities of a divided world, from the war-torn human realms to the ferocious wildling factions and the relentless forces of the demonic underworld. Adapt your strategies to face enemies that test your skill and resolve at every turn.

  • Environmental Strategy: Utilize floating platforms and diverse landscapes to outmaneuver foes, turning the environment into your greatest ally.

  • Powerful Items and Artifacts: Utilize an arsenal of unique passive and active items, from spell-breaking rings to explosive fire potions, to overcome overwhelming odds.

Totally free game.

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains blood and cartoonish violence.
